title: Harry Kane and Marcus Rashford head four-man Barcelona January transfer wishlist
text:

Barcelona have reportedly included Harry Kane and Marcus Rashford on their four-man wishlist as they bid to find a long-term replacement for Luis Suarez.

Suarez, 32, has grabbed six goals in all competitions for Barca this season but the Spanish giants are already planning for life without the former Liverpool star.

Given the fact he turns 33 in January, Barca are keen on adding youth to their forward line and Mundo Deportivo has claimed that they have drawn up a four-man list of potential replacements.

Among them is Tottenham star Kane, who has been strongly linked with a move elsewhere due to Spurs' failure to challenge for silverware.

(Image: Sportimage/PA Images)

Manchester United hitman Rashford, who recently signed a new contract at Old Trafford, is another Premier League star believed to be attracting interest from Barca.

Another top-flight star mentioned is Liverpool forward Roberto Firmino but, despite being long-term admirers of the Brazilian, Barca chiefs have seemingly accepted that a deal is unrealistic at the moment.

And whether Rashford or Kane will make the move to the Nou Camp remains to be seen too, as the Spanish publication claims that Paris Saint-Germain superstar Kylian Mbappe is top of their January wishlist.

However it's been claimed that Barca have doubts over whether they will be able to finance a deal for Mbappe in the next 12 months.

(Image: AFP/Getty Images)

But the club would look to sign the France international in the near future and may well step up their pursuit when he enters the final year of his contract in 2021.

The fourth name reportedly interesting the Spaniards is Lautaro Martinez, the Argentina international who currently plies his trade in Italy with Inter Milan.

Like Rashford, Martinez is a versatile forward who can also play on the wing, and has three goals in nine games this season.
description: Barcelona have drawn up a four-man transfer wishlist as they look to find a long-term replacement for Luis Suarez
